pages.text: The Spear of the Huntsman is the main weapon of the $(l:creatures/horned_huntsman)Horned Huntsman$(/l). When wielded, it grants resistance from $(item)Knockback$() and when used in combat has a chance to spawn a $(item)Wolf$() to assist its owner. The spear is somewhat more effective at combat against creatures of the $(l:dimensions/spirit_world)Spirit World$(/l).
